key_stories: Wanting everyone to bow to him
Getting jealous when Mordechai wouldn't bow
Making a bad plan because of jealousy
research.age_appropriate_summary: Haman felt very jealous when someone wouldn't bow to him. His jealousy made him make bad choices. We can feel jealous sometimes, but we should make good choices.

design.visual_description: Adult man with frustrated pouty expression - NOT scary
clothing: Persian-style clothing in MUTED dusty purple and gray-brown
distinguishing_features: Dark pointed goatee with connected mustache
design.style_prompt:
Children's book cartoon character HAMAN:
- Adult man with frustrated pouty expression - NOT scary
- Dark pointed goatee with connected mustache
- Furrowed brow
- Jealous expression (not angry)
- Arms often crossed
- Shoulders hunched
- DISTINCTIVE THREE-CORNERED HAT (like hamantaschen shape)
- Persian-style clothing in MUTED dusty purple and gray-brown
- Three-cornered hat
- Rounded, friendly cartoon style
- Thick clean black outlines
- Bold colors, simple shapes
- LARGE expressive eyes (20% of face)
